title: eppaDi enrennai
sahitya:
eppaDi enrennai kELAdIr ayyA ippaDi enna nAn iyalEnE


anupallavi

  appaDi ennai avan aLLik-kalandAn avanukkE ALAghi ennai marandEn


caraNam    kaNNukkuk-kaN avan kAdukkuk-kAdavan kadirukkuk-kadiravan kATrukku vAnavan
eNNukku mannavan paNNukkuL oliyavan irumaiyil orumaiyil ennuLLE nAnAnAn
